name: Dark spirit
description:
Dark spirit is an exciting game where you will find yourself in the role of a vengeful ghost imprisoned in an ancient castle. Terrible secrets, dark corners and encounters with enemies - all this awaits you in this exciting adventure. Are you ready to reveal all the secrets of the castle and free your dark soul? Prepare for deadly battles, journeys through dark dungeons and encounters with ancient villains. Your revenge will be ruthless and terrifying - are you ready to become a ghost, ready to end everything with your enemies?

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Explore the levels, destroy enemies and move on to the next levels.

After the last enemy falls at your feet, the castle will be free and you will become a free ghost, ready to start a new life in the spirit world.
